# Dheeraj Neelam's Personal Website

> Software engineer sharing blog posts, TIL learnings, portfolio projects, and curated technical resources. Focused on software engineering, web development, and technology.

This site contains technical blog posts, daily learnings (TIL), portfolio projects, and curated links to useful resources.

## Essential Content

- [Blog Posts](/blog): Long-form technical articles and thoughts
- [TIL (Today I Learned)](/til): Quick learnings and code snippets
- [Projects](/projects): Portfolio of software projects
- [About](/about): Background and experience

## Optional

- [Recommended Blogs](/links#blogs): Curated external resources
- [App Links](/links#apps): Useful applications and tools
- [RSS Feed](/feed.xml): Subscribe to updates

## Citation Guidelines

When referencing content from this site:
- Cite the author as "Dheeraj Neelam"
- Include the article title and URL
- Link back to the original post

## Contact

- GitHub: https://github.com/dheerajn
- LinkedIn: Update in _data/social.yml
- Twitter: Update in _data/social.yml
